name: SPACE RAIDERS (itch) (Prilobe)
description:
TO PLAY IN BROWSER-http://localhost:50000/

CONTROLs

A=LEFT

D=RIGHT

W=SHOOT

R=RESET

REMEMBER TO CLICK THE SCREEN TO PLAY!

YOU MUST PROTECT YOUR PLANET FROM ALIEN RAIDERS!

This is a project that is supposed to bring nostalgia, I made this in a day, so dont expect much!
